articles.author: Bruce Haring
articles.title: Leonardo DiCaprio Remembers ‘Titanic’ Producer Jon Landau - Deadline
articles.description: Titanic star Leonardo DiCaprio recalled the kindness of his 'Titanic' producer Jon Landau, who died at age 63.
articles.content:
The remembrances of producer Jon Landau continued Sunday, including one from Titanic star Leonardo DiCaprio.
Landau, producer on the Oscar-winning Titanic and Avatar, died Saturday at age 63, prompt… [+962 chars]
